content.body: i was there last week, saw people i hadn't seen in 10 years
actually ran into mark there on the first day lol

> <@shuyuguo:matrix.org> do you go to splash?

I try to. I went last year, but this year, it was sandwiched between a bunch of other travel and I couldn't reasonably make it work. Have to be home some time. Easily the best academic conference of the year though.
